pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660
  • Additional Notes: There is a test scene to check compatibility.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 760
  • Additional Notes: There is a test scene to check compatibility.
